mapper.select: SELECT AI_ADDRESS_NO,AI.M_NO,M_NAME,AI_RECEIVER_NAME,AI_ADDRESS_NAME,AI_ADDRESS, AI_ADDRESS_DETAIL,AI_ZIP_CODE,AI_COMMENT,AI_PHONE,AI_STATUS FROM TB_ADDRESS_INFO AI JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(M.M_NO = AI.M_NO) WHERE AI.M_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY DECODE(AI_STATUS,'Y', 1) ASC

SELECT AI_ADDRESS_NO,AI.M_NO,M_NAME,AI_RECEIVER_NAME,AI_ADDRESS_NAME,AI_ADDRESS, AI_ADDRESS_DETAIL,AI_ZIP_CODE,AI_COMMENT,AI_PHONE,AI_STATUS FROM TB_ADDRESS_INFO AI JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(M.M_NO = AI.M_NO) WHERE AI_ADDRESS_NO = #{addressInfoNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ADDRESS_INFO SET M_NO = #{memberNo}, AI_STATUS = #{status}, AI_RECEIVER_NAME = #{receiverName}, AI_ADDRESS_NAME = #{addressName}, AI_ADDRESS = #{address}, AI_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{addressDetail}, AI_ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode}, AI_COMMENT = #{comment}, AI_PHONE = #{phone} WHERE AI_ADDRESS_NO = #{addressNo}
